itemDescription: British politician, Member of Parliament for Leominster

wikipedia_page.main:
John Ward (22 December 1779 – 24 February 1855) was a British politician.
Ward had Holwood House built for him between 1823 and 1826 and resided there.Ward was a Member of Parliament (MP) for Leominster from 11 Feb 1830 to 2 August 1830.Ward was High Sheriff of Kent in 1835.He died aged 75.
